import React from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { useGetBookByIdQuery } from "../Apis/bookApi"; function BookDetails() { const { bookId } = useParams(); const { data, isLoading } = useGetBookByIdQuery(bookId); return (
{!isLoading ? ( <>

{data.result.name}

CATEGORY SPECIAL TAG

{data.result.description}

$10     XX
) : (
Loading...
)}
); } export default BookDetails;
